reuters.title: MINING TECHNOLOGY UNIT ENTERS SALES AGREEMENT
reuters.body: <Mining Technology and Resources Inc> said its wholly-owned subsidiary, Mine Support Systems Inc, entered into a sales agreement with <R.M. Wilson Co Inc> of Wheeling, W. Va. R.M. Wilson will serve as Mine Support's exclusive sales agent for the company's Mine Roof Support System in the U.S., the company said. Reuter 
